outputs.output_descr: Project team established in the Judiciary to complete the implementation of the Project Implementation Phase (PIP) of the Institutional Support to the Judiciary of Southern Sudan.

donor_name: DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
outputs.output_descr: The JoSS lacks appropriate organizational structure and human capital development policy coupled with inadequate training & research capacity. The JoSS has limited number of judicial staff proficient in common law, English language & ICT. Further,    Support staff has limited capacity to execute the mandate of JoSS. To enhance JoSS staff capacity, the project supports the implementation of integrated capacity development activities in collaboration with JoSS.

project_descr: Institutional Support to Judiciary of Southern Sudan
project_title: Support to Judiciary of Southern Sudan
